rows.label: qst002101_msg001
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qst002101_msg002
rows.name: Please bring it to me quickly, mo.

rows.label: qst002101_msg003
rows.name: Thank you very much.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Rex. I hear you've
become a Driver.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah, but I'm still salvaging too.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0003
rows.name:
That's convenient. I have something
I'd like to ask you about...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0004
rows.name:
Perfect timing. I was thinking
of asking a Driver for help.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0005
rows.name: Will you hear me out?

rows.label: qst002101_msg0006
rows.name:
For a little while now, the
water has stopped flowing
from this water source.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0007
rows.name:
Without water, I can't take my
beloved baths, and cooking and
washing become difficult...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0008
rows.name:
There are other water sources, so it's
not an emergency yet, but if that's the
cause, the others will eventually...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0009
rows.name: It's because of Enemy Name (temp).

rows.label: qst002101_msg0010
rows.name:
I don't know if it's their breeding
season or what, but they're nesting on
the underside of this Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0011
rows.name:
The last time was two years ago,
so I thought we had a bit more
time. I let my guard down...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0012
rows.name:
I usually have to request
a Driver to come all the
way to the village, but...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0013
rows.name:
I heard you were at Correl's
house, so I thought I'd ask you.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0014
rows.name: Thanks.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm going to give you a
cylinder for the enemy (temp).

rows.label: qst002101_msg0016
rows.name:
Please use this to salvage
from Messet Point.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0017
rows.name:
If you do that, you should be
able to hook the enemies (temp)
nesting on the Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0018
rows.name: Two or three of them...

rows.label: qst002101_msg0019
rows.name:
It shouldn't be too
many, but be careful.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0101
rows.name:
Please use the enemy (temp) cylinder
to salvage from Messet Point.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0201
rows.name:
Thank you! The water started
flowing from here again just now.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0202
rows.name:
Now I can do my cooking and washing,
and take as many baths as I like.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0203
rows.name: Drivers really are amazing.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0204
rows.name:
You make things that are
impossible for us look easy.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0205
rows.name: And Rex is a salvager on top of that.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0206
rows.name:
I'm impressed by how capable you
all are at such a young age.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0207
rows.name:
Well, here's your reward. I collected
it from everyone in the village.

rows.label: qst002101_msg0208
rows.name: Please take it.
